original_text: And Balaam said to the donkey, “Because you have made a fool of me. I wish I had a sword in my hand, for then I would kill you.”
korean_text: 발람이 나귀에게 말하되 네가 나를 거역하기 때문이니 내 손에 칼이 있었더면 곧 너를 죽였으리라

sentences.original_text: And Balaam said to the donkey,
Because you have made a fool of me.
I wish I had a sword in my hand,
for then I would kill you.
